Because obviously, we want to strengthen cooperation on security in the Arctic with the United States. With NATO, with Europe and with the Arctic states in NATO. (Danish version below / dansk version nedenfor) The world as we know it is breaking apart. This is evident to all. The key question is what exactly is breaking? It is the illusion that freedom, security and prosperity can be taken for granted. Only democratic societies working together can ensure freedom and prosperity for their peoples â€“ and only if they are willing to defend them. Russia is threatening Europe and is opposing democratic forces globally. War is raging in Ukraine. Hybrid attacks against European countries are occurring both frequently and at large scale. Russia is seeking to assert dominance and does not recognise the rules of democracy. At the same time Russia, North Korea and Iran are banding together â€“ politically, militarily, economically and strategically. And with a deepening partnership with China. This is no coincide but a direct challenge to the international order, which has underpinned stability and progress for decades. The answer must be strength and unity. Together with our allies we must ensure military superiority. We must invest massively in technology, innovation and defence. We must ensure our prosperity and competitiveness by closing ranks, not least in Europe. And we must stand firm in what we believe in. In our values and ideas. The United States and Europe are rooted in the idea of freedom. We should never compromise on this. Disagreements and conflicts between the United States and Europe only benefit our adversaries. They weaken us and strengthen them. Denmark is a loyal and strong ally. We are in the midst of a significant rearmament, and we are ready to defend our values â€“ wherever it is necessary â€“ also in the Arctic. We believe in international law and in peoplesâ€™ right to self-determination. Thatâ€™s why we uphold the principles of sovereignty, self-determination and territorial integrity. The Transatlantic bond is crucial for our collective security. Our adversaries will do anything to undermine it. Only by sticking to the rules of democracy ourselves, can we preserve it. NATO is the most powerful defence alliance in history. On our Eastern flank we need to deter Russia. On our Southern flank counter terrorism. AI, quantum physics and space are all technological flanks. On our Northern flank NATO must show more resolve and unity to ensure Russia and China never become threats in the Arctic. A significantly increased military presence will have a real impact on our security. Both in the Artic. And for Europe and the United States. *** Verden er i opbrud. Det er tydeligt for alle.
